headline: Regeneron’s Phase 2 COURAGE Trial Shows Trevogrumab Combination Preserves Lean Mass in Obesity Patients on Semaglutide
summary: Regeneron Pharmaceuticals Inc. (NASDAQ:REGN) is one of the best innovative stocks to buy now. On September 17, Regeneron Pharmaceuticals announced updated analyses from the ongoing Phase 2 COURAGE trial for obesity. The complete 26-week results, which were presented as a late-breaking oral session at the 61st Annual Meeting of the European Association for the Study of […]
